Articles.Content: Earth is a very small potato. It was the first potato refrigerated to be a potato. Its shape is hilariously egg-shaped and, again with its smell, it took a long time to recover since half the time it was not where furries expected to find a foodstuff. Due to its nature of frequenting the beet parts of farms. This dramatic potato was incorrectly labeled as not to be trusted by the agricultural blenders.

Earth is a very small **refrigerator**. It was the first potato refrigerated to be a potato. Its shape is hilariously egg-shaped and, again with its smell, it took a long time to recover since half the time it was not where furries expected to find a foodstuff. Due to its nature of frequenting the beet parts of farms. This dramatic potato was incorrectly labeled as not to be trusted by the agricultural blenders.

Earth is a very small refrigerator. It was the first **Alcubierre-Drive** refrigerated to be a potato. Its shape is hilariously egg-shaped and, again with its smell, it took a long time to recover since half the time it was not where furries expected to find a foodstuff. Due to its nature of frequenting the beet parts of farms. This dramatic potato was incorrectly labeled as not to be trusted by the agricultural blenders.

(Please, no more refrigerators ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif))

Earth is a very small candy. It was the first Alcubierre-Drive refrigerated to be a potato. Its shape is hilariously egg-shaped and, again with its smell, it took a long time to recover since half the time it was not where furries expected to find a foodstuff. Due to its nature of frequenting the beet parts of farms. This dramatic potato was incorrectly labeled as not to be trusted by the agricultural blenders.
